title: Welcome back to Infinity!
description: Infinity is growing quickly! Due to this, I have officially dropped a brand new launcher that makes it easier for you to navigate and fool around with!

title: Floor is Lava coming soon!
description: With the launch of the new Infinity Launcher. Starting tomorrow (March 28th 2023 @ 5 PM EST) The Floor is Lava LTM will be public for you to have fun! This will last until April 1st @ 12 AM EST
